header_text: You live with a few extended family members. Your friend asks if they can come over for dinner one day, but they don't know how many people live in your home. As you picture your friend coming into your home, you think they will be surprised.

elements.text: You consider that you live in a different situation compared to your friend. You also know that your friend is really nice, so they will be...
